caption.title: HCPS risk lower limits.
caption.p: Map of lower limits of Hantavirus infection risk according to the five scenarios evaluated: (A) sugar cane expansion, (B) temperature anomalies of RCP4.5, (C) and RCP8.5 scenarios, (D) RCP4.5 and RCP8.5 scenarios combined with sugar cane expansion (D and E, respectively).
Click here for additional data file.
